summary: "Friday the 13th" (2009) is an American horror movie, the 12th in the franchise. Directed by Marcus Nispel, it follows Clay who searches for his sister Whitney, taken by killer Jason Voorhees at Crystal Lake. The film combines elements from the first four movies, giving Jason a more sympathetic backstory but keeping him menacing. It used a remake of the original mask and some iconic music. Despite negative reviews, it made $92.7 million at the box office on a $19 million budget.
title: Friday the 13th (2009 film)
